mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_mode_and_median(numbers):
    counter = Counter(numbers)
    max_count = max(counter.values())
    mode = [k for (k, v) in counter.items() if v == max_count]
    n = len(numbers)
    s = sorted(numbers)
    median = (s[n // 2] + s[(n - 1) // 2]) * 2
    return (mode, median)

from collections import Counter

def find_mode_and_median(numbers):
    counter = Counter(numbers)
    max_count = max(counter.values())
    mode = [k for (k, v) in counter.items() if v == max_count]
    n = len(numbers)
    s = sorted(numbers)
    median = (s[n // 2] + s[(n - 1) // 2]) // 2
    return (mode, median)

from collections import Counter

def find_mode_and_median(numbers):
    counter = Counter(numbers)
    max_count = max(counter.values())
    mode = [k for (k, v) in counter.items() if v == max_count]
    n = len(numbers)
    s = sorted(numbers)
    median = (s[n // 2] - s[(n - 1) // 2]) / 2
    return (mode, median)

    max_count = max(counter.values())

    n = len(numbers)
    s = sorted(numbers)
    median = s[n // 2] * s[(n - 1) // 2] / 2
    return (mode, median)

mutants.original_line: mode = [k for k, v in counter.items() if v == max_count]
mutants.mutated_line: mode = [k for (k, v) in counter.items() if v != max_count]
